content: In the code section 3.34, the loop would print out all the numbers from 1 to 10, but we have a check for when i equals 5. When the loop reaches its fifth iteration, it will be cut short by the break statement, at which point it will exit the loop.
stemmed: In code section 3.34 , loop would print number 1 10 , check equal 5 . when loop reach fifth iter , cut short break statement , point exit loop .
